definition: stupid/sluggish/clumsy/to wiggle (of worms)/to move in a disorderly fashion
to begin to stir (idiom)/to get restless/to become threatening
to begin to stir (idiom)/to get restless/to become threatening
to wriggle/(fig.) to stir up trouble/(of a sentiment) to stir

sentences.english: I provoked him into doing something really stupid.
sentences.chinese: 我用激将法使他做了件很蠢的事。

sentences.english: No one likes feeling stupider than the next persons.
sentences.chinese: 没有人希望自己比别人蠢。

sentences.english: One US official at the time called this the "stupidest thing this country ever did".
sentences.chinese: 当时一名美国官员称此举“立国以来，蠢无前例”。

sentences.english: I have never seen a bigger bean brain like you.
sentences.chinese: 我从没见过比你更蠢的蠢才。

sentences.english: "Stupid guy," I muttered to myself, switching off the television.
sentences.chinese: “蠢东西，”我自言自语地咕哝道，关掉了电视。

sentences.english: If my children are silly I must hope to be always sensible of it.
sentences.chinese: 要是我自己的孩子果真蠢，我决不愿意没有自知之明。

sentences.english: Many of the people in his books were foolish men and women with empty values.
sentences.chinese: 他的书中，许多人是丧失价值观的蠢男和愚女。

sentences.english: A: It was stupid of me to go bungee jumping.
sentences.chinese: 我居然去蹦极，真是太蠢了。

sentences.english: You can't trick me out of my money. I'm not that dumb!
sentences.chinese: 你骗不走我的钱，我没那么蠢。

sentences.english: Why can't I bend these stupid bars?
sentences.chinese: 我为什么不能扭弯这些蠢栏杆？

sentences.english: How foolish were we to buy that load of crap?
sentences.chinese: 我们怎么那么蠢，竟相信那些废话？

sentences.english: You can tell how stupide westerner are.
sentences.chinese: 你可以告诉如此蠢的西方人的是。

sentences.english: I don't know who's more stupid, you or the hick.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道是谁比较蠢，你还是乡巴佬？

sentences.english: Why aren't you following your big dumb door-opener?
sentences.chinese: 你为什么不跟着你那又大又蠢的踢门器？

sentences.english: When one of his teachers criticizes him, he says,what do you know you bimbo?
sentences.chinese: 当他老师斥责他时，他说，你这个蠢女人知道什么？

sentences.english: Human is pathetic and pitiable, by learning Buddhadharma we can be more sober.
sentences.chinese: 人类又蠢又可怜，学佛可以使人类清醒一点。

definition: to be foolish/to play dumb/to gaze absentmindedly
erhua variant of 缺心眼[que1 xin1 yan3]
